QuestionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

QuestionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

QuestionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Question_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Question_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Question_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Question_Data.description: The category that this question belongs to.
The number of employee review template(s) that this Question is used in.

validation.validation: You can't delete a Question that is in use.
validation.description: You can't delete a Question that is in use.

description: Used to delete a particular instance specified in the Review Question Reference.
